Chobani Yogurt and it's owner [[Hamdi Ulukaya]] sued<ref>http://online.wsj.com/public/resources/documents/2017_0424_chobani_v_jones_complaint.PDF</ref> Jones for defamatory statements he made alleging that "the company's factory in Idaho, which employs refugees, was connected to a 2016 child sexual assault and a rise in tuberculosis cases"<ref>https://www.nytimes.com/2017/04/25/business/chobani-alex-jones.html</ref>. It was settled out of court<ref>https://www.nytimes.com/2017/05/17/us/alex-jones-chobani-lawsuit.html</ref>, and Alex retracted his statements, but has [[279: Formulaic Objections|since hinted]] he still believes the allegations he made.
